name: GOSCAM
0:
”Alexa open goscam”
”Alexa ask goscam to turn off the garage camera motion detection”
”Alexa ask goscam to take a picture with garage camera”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: goscam
des:
Control your GOSCAM Smart Camera with your voice using Amazon Alexa and this Alexa skill. Pan and tilt the camera, get motion, temperature, and sound alert info and much more!

You need at least one GOSCAM Smart Camera and an Alexa-enabled speaker (like the GOSCAM Smart Speaker). Simply search for "GOSCAM" in the Alexa app, select the GOSCAM Smart Camera skill and press "Enable Skill." The Alexa app will take you through the steps to link your Alexa and GOSCAM profiles. 

Once your GOSCAM Smart Camera and this Alexa skill are linked, you're ready to go! 

To start controlling your Smart Camera by voice, just say "Alexa, open GOSCAM." Then control your camera by using one of the following phrases:

"Pan the {device name} camera left/right"
"Tilt the {device name} camera up/down"
"Take a picture with the {device name} camera"
"Start recording with the {device name} camera"
"Turn on/off {device name} camera motion detection" 
"Turn on/off {device name} camera temperature alert"
"Turn on/off {device name} camera sound detection"
"Play/stop lullaby on {device name} camera"
"Check the temperature at the {device name} camera"
"Check the last sound/motion detected by {device name} camera"

Version 1.0.3
